text: Avdotyino () is a rural locality (a selo) in Krasnoselskoye Rural Settlement of Yuryev-Polsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 197 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located 26 km south-east from Yuryev- Polsky. == References == Category:Rural localities in Yuryev-Polsky District
title: Avdotyino, Yuryev-Polsky District, Vladimir Oblast
